thread.title: Japan: 3DS Opens Up Big Gap to PlayStation 4
thread.title_full: Japan: 3DS Opens Up Big Gap to PlayStation 4 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Japan: 3DS Opens Up Big Gap to PlayStation 4
text: The 3DS handheld has managed to get a solid boost in sales during the past week and has moved from 28,279 units delivered to fans to close to 49,000, cementing its place at the top of the hardware sales chart in Japan. The PlayStation 4 has also improved its own performance during the week that ran from August 24 to August 30, with the Sony home console managing to move 18,539 devices, up from 14,495. According to Media Create data Quote: d by Â»
